pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Kernel Sums // Implements the method of Hofmeyr, D.P. (2019) 10.1109/TPAMI.2019.2930501 for fast evaluation of univariate kernel smoothers based on recursive computations. Applications to the basic problems of density and regression function estimation are provided, as well as some projection pursuit methods for which the objective is based on non-parametric functionals of the projected density, or conditional density of a response given projected covariates.
